channel.title: Blog - VG Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on VG Homepage

item.title: Delft After Rain
item.description: It was so beautiful the city of Delft after a rain in a nice summer afternoon. I attached some pictures taken on the way to the city centre.

item.title: Invitation to My PhD Defence
item.description: You are cordially invited to the public online defence of my PhD dissertation, which will be held on Monday, Sep 21st, 2020 at 15:00 Amsterdam time (CET). The dissertation is entitled: Using Social Media to Characterise Crowds in City Events for Crowd Management.
